game_description: An open world where everything is climable and you can hang your Zen Monkeys ANYWHERE! The sequal to the most loved Zen game, "Zen Monkeys", is here. The Islands is a Zen game like no other. The entire open world is climable and full of sights to see. The Islands - Zen Monkeys II features: - A fully climable world; - New grapple gun mechanics for fast traversal; - Limitless anti-gravity bars to hang your Zen Monkeys or climb yourself; - A large and peaceful pirate themed world to explore. The Islands - Zen Monkeys II is the best game for finding your Zen and relaxing in the quite surroundings of the Islands.
